label: AI Services (Managed Identity)
description: Attach an Azure AI Services resource using managed identity.

fields.label: Identity
fields.tooltip: The user-assigned managed identity used for connections to AI Service. If not specified, the system-assigned managed identity is used. On updates to the skillset, if the identity is unspecified, the value remains unchanged. If set to "none", the value of this property is cleared.

fields.label: Subdomain URL
fields.tooltip: The subdomain URL for the corresponding AI Service.
